metadata.synopsis: Minsc and Jaheira enter Blushing Mermaid

4.speaker: Minsc
4.text: Jaheira, Minsc's memory of his last time in this taproom is a little... fuzzy. Did he...?
4.context: NodeContext: Vaguely looking around the Blushing Mermaid

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Fear not, Rashemaar. It has never been your way to over-indulge.
0.context: NodeContext: Smiling, putting him out of his misery that he might've gotten too drunk

2.speaker: Jaheira
2.text: But you did offend one of my contacts by letting Boo paddle around in her tankard. Pewter, I believe - she cracked it over your head.

3.speaker: Minsc
3.text: Oh, praise the Three! Minsc was afraid he had shamed myself. I will, eh, leave a penny at the bar.
3.context: NodeContext: Palpable relief. This is a much more acceptable outcome.

1.speaker: Jaheira
1.text: Best leave two. I cracked her with my own, afterward. She was drinking grog - Boo's backside could only have improved it.
